frame.name: Reporting
frame.definition: <def-root>In this frame an <fen>Informer</fen> informs the <fen>Authorities</fen> of the illegal or otherwise improper <fen>Behavior</fen> of the <fen>Wrongdoer</fen>. <ex> <fex name="Informer">Tony</fex> <t>reported</t> <fex name="Wrongdoer">Michael</fex> <fex name="Authorities">to the police</fex> <fex name="Behavior">for breaking into his car</fex>. </ex> <ex> <fex name="Informer">The teacher</fex> <t>reported</t> <fex name="Behavior">the bathroom vandalism</fex>. <fex name="Aut">DNI</fex> </ex></def-root>

FE.name: Informer
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Informer</fen> reports the activities of the <fen>Wrongdoer</fen> to the <fen>Authorities</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Wrongdoer
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Wrongdoer</fen> has his or her activities reported to the <fen>Authorities</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Authorities
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Authorities</fen> are the officials, government or otherwise, who handle misbehavior.</def-root>

FE.name: Behavior
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Behavior</fen> is the action or actions for which the <fen>Wrongdoer</fen> is reported.</def-root>

FE.name: Time
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Time</fen> when the <fen>Informer</fen> reports the <fen>Behavior</fen> of the <fen>Wrongdoer</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Place
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Place</fen> is the location where the reporting occurs.</def-root>

FE.name: Purpose
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Purpose</fen> is the purpose for which the <fen>Informer</fen> reports the <fen>Wrongdoer</fen>.</def-root>
